title: LIOC suspends sale of petrol in cans, containers and bottles
body_lines: Amidst the shortage of petrol persisting in the country, Lanka IOC (LIOC) has decided to suspend the sale of petrol in cans, containers, or bottles with immediate effect.
The IndianOil’s subsidiary in Sri Lanka noted that hereafter its filling stations will dispense petrol only to fuel tanks of vehicles.
